Entry.329: Go down meet Gibby. Man falls overboard & I break V. Roxy plate. Dig in garden in the wet & dress to visit Ellis in the evening. Meet Mrs Hancock. Also visit Eunice & Muriel. Hilda comes Home but I miss her.
Entry.330: Out on the rocks in garden all morning. Go on late patrol in afternoon. Go for walk to Ellis place. Go up to see H Hickson after Tea. Stay late & miss last tram but get Freshy bus.
Entry.331: Go to Bessies & Jack’s place at Haby, ville. He has nice garden which we all inspect. Spend pleasant evening.
Entry.332: Recd letter from MRL. Go to Otto’s place for Cards. Hurry Home. We attempt Bridge.
Entry.333: Home & play piano but go to bed early.
Entry.334: E & E to Tea. We play cards. Dad with much persuasion goes to Palit meeting in Brookvale.
Entry.335: Work, work, work. I go round Paddy’s market see man trying Girls Comi-peti on.
Entry.336: Carnival. I am Seating Steward. I turn in, Hood down. Good sports & swimming events. We come Home for Tea. Mum, Hanna, Bess & I go to Manly for a walk after Tea. B & I miss Mum & L in Political Meeting.
Entry.337: Bess, Laura & I do gardening. We go to Ellan Vannin after dinner. Have a very cold swim & get weather bound. Home for tea. I see ‘em off on boat & meet Dave & Misses Jones at Ellis’ place. We laugh & sing & play.
Entry.338:
Feel well & fit up after so many years. Mrs Doyle to visit in Home. Write after 9 pm to Auntie.

Wrote M & Auntie Annie.
Entry.339:
Pick Gum leaves & post letter to Auntie. E on boat. We go to A. H. & Sons see Brultes, syce & beetles & butterflies. 

Home & chatter.

Recd letter from MRL.

Wrote until bed time.

Wrote (M & Aunt Annie)
Entry.341:
E comes out & we play Bridge but D & I lose badly.

Roy comes in & I receive a letter from Johnno after lying a fortnight in drawer.
Entry.342: We see Motor Bike & pay deposit. I eventually buy it on the
Entry.343:
13 December, Saturday

Catch 1.5 train & arrive Wyong 3.35 but no one to meet. They turn up at 4.15 We get Home before 5 & tea. Allie comes over go to mouth for prawns .Just get out of Church before dusk. We have a nice outing.
Entry.344: Up at 4.30. Lovely morn fishing we go 15 off rocks other all round lake but to rocks & I get bites even. Swim. Girls run in bush. Struggle round to swim. Dress on boat. Good train Home 9.30. Supper of Toma & apricots & go bed at Beulah.
Entry.345: Come Home & Dad & Mum go to Progress Meeting & I go to bed.
Entry.346: Go Home. Mr Lembe comes to tune Piano & we all help. I make a hell effect.
Entry.347: Go to L St Johns. Very hot night & two others perspire very much. We have a nice time down south.
Entry.348: Go to Inksdale. We laugh & talk. I try to put the acid on Bill but fail.
Entry.349:
Fairly quiet. I go to Ot’s Solicitor & get Riding Licence. Meet Bob Ward. Try to fix make but fail.

Recd letters from Connie & Mr F.

Buy P.C’s of Birds & animals but do not buy dinner.
Entry.350: Otto does not come in. but Esme does. Pa comes up & we have lot of work. I try to get Bike Home but come a thud at North Sydney. Tram to Mosman ans Motor to Manly. Dick & Ellis at Home. We catch Dolly. Tea & Etta & E goes to pictures. D & I to band, & D & Mum up & down Corso.
Entry.351: Dick goes to Town. D G & I do garden. I go to Manly. Ring up Dick. E & I surf & there are many rescues. I go shopping in my deshabille & Home & go to meet Reg & Dick in deshabille, we go to Baths to swim. It is very cold. tea at E’s & go to bend. Catch 9 boat & tram.
Entry.352: Go to Lodge for my Ring. Sit on beach. Call at Dobboe’s about 8 pm for Tea. Home at 9.30 & address X’mas Cards to Nettie, Mrs Mel, M Cocks, Clarke, Cuneo, Aunt G, & F, Granma, Mrs Lawrence, Jack, Preddys, M Harper.
Entry.353: To I.O.O.F. Lodge. We have music, singing, dancing. I play for dances etc. Catch 11 pm tram Home.
Entry.354: Not very busy. I buy wines & send Home. We catch 10.10 tram & after good journey although that & heavy job parcel carrying we reach Forest Home. Bed at 2 am & up at 5 am. We have nice merry day.
Entry.355:
Up at 5 am & spend a Merry X’mas.

Plenty of music & merry arie.
Entry.356: We work & play & gather X’mas bush some get stung by ants & I get stung in a funny place & I am told I am not nice to know. We try the motor bike.
Entry.357:
We send Mrs T Home early.

We go shopping & up to the orchard. I get very dopey after sleeping & it is very very hot.
Entry.358: I try to K another fellow & fail. I do all jobs even to nursery maid. We try to ride the bike but the swim beats us. We go up for eggs but get no fruit. We chop a lot of wood. Am tired. George sick. We all go to bed about 8.30. plenty music to make me remember.
Entry.359: We (O & I) come down alone. A lovely run on a cool morning. I work well all day. Rec’d X’mas Card from I of M. Nette & Johnsons are at Home & we have Music etc.
Entry.360: Home again. I amuse D & Mum with piano & get to bed at 9. Go to 430A at 1 pm.
Entry.361:
Go to Top’s. We wait & watch for Slaper. Music & until the Boy Come Home.

Get to bed at 12.30 am. I am again at 430A. Dine with Ellis who cls the bike over.
